entry.title: My One And Only
entry.summary:
Author: yannowhatigiveup

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 98,462Chapters: 32/?Kudos: 1,658

Summary: Damian Wayne convinced his father to let him go to Paris to learn more about these 'mysterious attacks'. Little did he know he would find a pretty little girl with bluebell eyes. Meanwhile, Adrien Agreste contemplates whether Marinette is 'just a friend'. Little did he know he was already too late.This is my first mlb fanfic, actually it's my first fanfic here on ao3.Disclaimer: The batfam members will be incorrect as I'm not part of the dc fan base. I just thought the ship was cute. And I’m not that good with writing either. You have been warned.July 2025 edit: returned from hiatus
